runCommand:
$ErrorActionPreference = "SilentlyContinue"
Stop-Transcript | out-null
$ErrorActionPreference = "Continue"
Start-Transcript -Path C:\Chef\$env:COMPUTERNAME.log -Append
Initialize-AWSDefaultConfiguration -Region us-east-1
Copy-S3Object -BucketName ovid-main -Key 'bin/winsanity.ps1' -LocalFolder C:\Temp -region us-east-1
powershell.exe -File C:\Temp\bin\winsanity.ps1 > C:\Temp\$env:COMPUTERNAME.log
Stop-Transcript
Write-S3Object -BucketName ovid-devtest  -KeyPrefix log -Folder C:\Temp  -SearchPattern *.log
$text = Get-Content C:\Temp\$env:COMPUTERNAME.log | Out-String
Publish-SNSMessage -Message $text -Region eu-west-1 -Subject $env:COMPUTERNAME -TopicArn arn:aws:sns:eu-west-1:171789863757:OCM-Server-Reports
